text: Sariha Belén Moya Angulo (born 1988) is an Ecuadorian economist and politician who has been the Minister of Economy and Finance since 2025. She was the acting Vice President of Ecuador from 11 November 2024 until 23 December 2024 during the temporary suspension of Vice President Verónica Abad Rojas. In November 2024, Moya was picked by President Daniel Noboa to replace suspended Vice President Verónica Abad Rojas. Before, she was the National Secretary of Planning from 2023 to 2024. In April 2025, President Noboa announced that he would name Moya to serve as the Minister of Economy and Finance. ==References== Category:1980s births Category:Living people Category:Vice presidents of Ecuador Category:Ecuadorian economists Category:Politicians from Quito
title: Sariha Moya
